page.title: 18CHARD IN THE FUTURE?
page.content: {Cars}will look like hovercraft.There would be a North end of a magnet on the ground and a South end of a magnet on the bottom of the car,which will keep the car off the ground.'Stickers' will stop the car.A fan propels the car about.There is a perspex dome over the car. {Houses}are built of a special material that keeps in the heat or gets rid of it depending on the season.There will be robots to clear the house and outside,the streets. {Clothes} will look like space suits to us.They will be light coloured during the day to reflect the heat and dark coloured at night to preserve the body's heat. {Food} will be in packets,all mixed up, all that will be necessary would be to add hot water.
